column.name: TITLE
column.value: 77/795/EEC: Council Decision of 12 December 1977 establishing a common procedure for the exchange of information on the quality of surface fresh water in the Community - Repealed by Directive 2000/60/EC establishing a framework for Community action in the field of water policy

column.name: LEGAL_NAME
column.value: Council Decision 77/795/CEE of 12 December 1977 establishing a common procedure for the exchange of information on the quality of surface fresh water in the Community

column.name: ABSTRACT
column.value:
Consolidated version: http://eur-lex.europa.eu/LexUriServ/LexUriServ.do?uri=CONSLEG:1977D0795:20040501:EN:PDF
The decision establishes a common procedure for the exchange of information on the quality of surface fresh water in the Community. The information covered by the exchange of information shall be: (a) the results of the measurements carried out by the sampling or measuring stations; (b) a description of the sampling, sample preservation and measuring methods used and the frequency of sampling.
The Decision is amended by: -Council Decision 81/856/EEC of 19 October 1981 adapting, consequent upon the accession of Greece, Decision 77/795/EEC. -Commission Decision 84/422/EEC of 24 July 1984 amending Annex I to Council Decision 77/795/EEC. -Council Decision 86/574/EEC of 24 November 1986 amending Decision 77/795/EEC. -Commission Decision 90/2/EEC of 14 December 1989 amending Annex I to Council Decision 77/795/EEC. -Council Regulation (EC) No 807/2003 of 14 April 2003 adapting to Decision 1999/468/EC the provisions relating to committees which assist the Commission in the exercise of its implementing powers laid down in Council instruments adopted in accordance with the consultation procedure.

column.name: COMMENT
column.value: The Decision 77/795/EEC has been repealed by the Water Framework Directive 2000/60/EEC 7 years after its entry into force (i.e. on 22/12/2007).

column.name: ISSUED_BY
column.value: DG XI European Commission

column.name: ALIAS
column.value: Exchange of information Decision on fresh water (consolidated)

column.name: TITLE
column.value: Basel Convention on the control of transboundary movements of hazardous wastes and their disposal

column.name: LEGAL_NAME
column.value: Basel Convention on the control of transboundary movements of hazardous wastes and their disposal

column.name: SECRETARIAT
column.value: Secretariat of the Basel Convention, United Nations Environment Programme

column.name: ABSTRACT
column.value: The Convention is the response of the international community to the problems caused by the annual worldwide production of 400 million tonnes of wastes which are hazardous to people or the environment because they are toxic, poisonous, explosive, corrosive, flammable, eco-toxic, or infectious.

column.name: COMMENT
column.value: Convention is amended by: Amendment to the Basel Convention on the control of transboundary movements of hazardous wastes and their disposal [CELEX No 21997A1004(01)] Convention is adopted by: Council Decision 93/98/EEC of 1 February 1993 on the conclusion, on behalf of the Community, of the Convention on the control of transboundary movements of hazardous wastes and their disposal (Basel Convention)(CELEX No 31993D0098).

column.name: ISSUED_BY
column.value: United Nations

column.name: ALIAS
column.value: Basel Convention

column.name: TITLE
column.value: Convention for the protection of the marine environment of the north-east Atlantic

column.name: LEGAL_NAME
column.value: Convention for the Protection of the Marine Environment of the North-East Atlantic (OSPAR Convention 1992)

column.name: SECRETARIAT
column.value: OSPAR Secretariat, New Court , 48 Carey Street, London WC2A 2JQ / UK, Tel: +44 (0) 20 7430 5200, Fax: +44 (0) 20 7430 5225, e-mail: secretariat@ospar.org

column.name: ABSTRACT
column.value: The Convention for the Protection of the Marine Environment of the North-East Atlantic ("OSPAR Convention").

column.name: COMMENT
column.value: The Convention for the Protection of the Marine Environment of the North-East Atlantic ("OSPAR Convention") was opened for signature at the Ministerial Meeting of the Oslo and Paris Commissions in Paris on 22 September 1992.

column.name: ISSUED_BY
column.value: OSPAR Commission

column.name: ALIAS
column.value: OSPAR Convention
